```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Import "FAS_litters.csv" using relative path
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df

#turns variable names into snackcase
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Import "FAS_pups.csv" file
```{r}
pups_df = read_csv("data/FAS_pups.csv")

pups_df = janitor::clean_names(pups_df)

# Look at data
pups_df

head(pups_df)

tail(pups_df)

```

# View entire dataset
```{r, eval = FALSE}
view(pups_df)
```

# Look at a data summary
```{r}
str(pups_df)

skimr::skim(pups_df)
```

## options in read_*
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv",
                      skip = 10,
                      col_names = FALSE)
```


Look at NA values:
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv",
                      na = c("NA")) #anytime it sees 19, it will treat it as missing value
```

Column Types:
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv",
                      col_types = cols(`GD0 weight`= col_character()))
#read GD0 weight as a chr rather tham numerical
```


## Other file types

Import excel file:
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
mlb_df = read_excel("data/mlb11.xlsx")
```

Import SAS file
```{r}
library(haven)
```

```{r}
pulse_df = read_sas("data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat")
```
